div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 962 ÄŒurek, c. 35 km. E of Sofia, Bulgaria, (1134) 1912 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 7-10 kilos AR Maroneia: spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: spread-flan tetradr., chiefly imit. Disposition: dispersed Filow, BSAB 3 (1912-13), p. 330 Mouchmov, BSAB 4 (1914), p. 274 AA 1914, p. 428
